name: The Spirit Warrior's Quest
description:
Made for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam!

--

As a spirit warrior, you have the power to disconnect your spirit from your body and fight with both of them! However, the spirit can do things the body can't, and vice versa, so be sure to experiment.

This game is more of a prototype & we currently do not plan on developing this into a full game; however we will if many people request it!

Any and all donations are appreciated- 30% of itch donations will go to supporting other indie devs! (Buying their games, supporting their Kickstarters, etc)

--
